meta.title: Contract #011: Paper Trail
meta.description: FINANCIAL AUDIT: No contradictions found. Trace the flow of ownership.
meta.journal: The eviction was legal but manufactured. The property was transferred to a shell company, condemned, and sold to Aethelgard Development in the same hour. The 'safety' rating was bought.

nodes.text: 09:00 - Registry: Title Deed transferred to 'Vanguard Holdings'.
--:-- - City Council: Property marked 'Unsafe for Habitation'.
10:00 - Security Cam: Tenants removed by private contractors.
